channel.title: Begging on Recology
channel.description: Recent content in Begging on Recology

item.title: Check out a video of my research at RocketHub
item.description: Okay, so this post isn’t at all about R - but I can’t resist begging my readers for some help. Iâ€™m trying to get some crowdfunding for my research on the evolution of native plants in agricultural landscapes. My campaign is part of a larger project by about 50 other scientists and me to see how well it works to go straight to the public to get funding for science research.
